title: PNC's Stone: Likes Financials Now, Adding to Technology (Audio)
itunes:title: PNC's Stone: Likes Financials Now, Adding to Technology (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Bill Stone, Chief Investment Strategist, PNC Asset Management Group, for a look at the markets, the economy and where he is investing. Live from the 2016 US Tennis Open.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
